page.title: 15Industry, Murroes area
page.content: In this area a firm called W.B.S.Keillor makes window and door frames. The{joiners}work in Edinburgh,Perth and Dundee.The firm also fixes cars.They{rustproof}and paint them. Up the road at Autoparts you can buy things for your car that have been taken out of{scrap cars. } In Wellbank there is a garage and blacksmith. They make gates and you get your petrol there.Down in Kellas there is Ken Scott,a{blacksmith}.He makes gates,fences and a lot of other things. At W.B.S.Keillor they sometimes hire a skip and they put all the rubbish from the paint shop in it.On Saturday they were burning a lot of old caravans and containers.
